title: Don
writer: Salim Khan, Javed Akhtar, Farhan Akhtar
short_cast: Shah Rukh Khan, Priyanka Chopra Jonas, Arjun Rampal, Isha Koppikar, Kareena Kapoor, Boman Irani, Om Puri, Pavan Malhotra
cast: Shah Rukh Khan, Priyanka Chopra Jonas, Arjun Rampal, Isha Koppikar, Kareena Kapoor, Boman Irani, Om Puri, Pavan Malhotra

desc: A ruthless crime boss and drug lord is nabbed and held captive by the authorities, who send his naïve look-alike to infiltrate the man's gang.
